description:
Kaoru opens a drugstore in a new country, the Kingdom of Jusral, in a return to her original goal of living an easy life in this new world with her OP ability. But once again, her potions draw attention in ways she didn`t expect...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata na Kuni de Shoshin ni Kaerimasu!
Going Back to My Original Goal in a New Country!
新たな国で初心に返ります!
